title: Skool.com Community Data Extractor
description: Transform your Skool community insights into actionable data with advanced filtering and search capabilities

tab.title: What do you want to scrape from Skool.com Classroom or Community?
tab.description: What do you want to scrape from Skool, Classroom or Community pages (tabs)?

includeComments.title: Include comments of each post(community) or course(classroom)
includeComments.description: Set to true if you want to include comments on each post or course.

commentsLimit.title: Comments Limit
commentsLimit.description: Maximum number of comments to scrape per post/item.

includeMedia.title: Include media files
includeMedia.description: Set to true if you want to include media files in the output.

maxItems.title: Set limit on how many items to scrape, default is 1000.
maxItems.description: Maximum number of items to scrape.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages that can be processed at the same time.

minConcurrency.title: Min Concurrency
minConcurrency.description: Minimum number of pages that will be processed at the same time.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max Request Retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Number of times the crawler will retry a failed request before giving up.

storeName.title: Name your storage for downloads/items (deduplication and long-term retention), it can only contain letters 'a' through 'z', the digits '0' through '9', and the hyphen ('-') but only in the middle of the string (e.g. 'my-value-1')
storeName.description: Assign a custom name to the Key-Value Store where your scraped listings will be saved. This ensures: Data Deduplication, Persistent Storage, Project Management, Data Reuse. (If left blank, the default storage will be used with standard retention limits.)

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Cookie used to authorize actor with skool.com. Install EditThisCookie chrome extension. Login to your skool.com account. Click on the extension and export the skool.com cookies. Insert the contents here

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Specifies proxy servers that will be used by the scraper in order to hide its origin. For details, see Proxy configuration in README.

searchPresets.title: Search Presets - Quick Filters
searchPresets.description: Choose a preset to quickly filter content by engagement and recency

minLikes.title: Minimum Likes Filter
minLikes.description: Only extract posts with at least this many likes (0 = no filter)

minComments.title: Minimum Comments Filter
minComments.description: Only extract posts with at least this many comments (0 = no filter)

keywordFilter.title: Keyword Filter (comma-separated)
keywordFilter.description: Only extract posts containing these keywords (e.g., 'AI, automation, growth'). Leave empty for no filter.

excludeKeywords.title: Exclude Keywords (comma-separated)
excludeKeywords.description: Skip posts containing these keywords (e.g., 'spam, promotional'). Leave empty for no exclusions.

sortBy.title: Sort Results By
sortBy.description: How to sort the extracted posts
